item.title: markdown 显示效果测试
item.description: 代码片段 import( "fmt" ) func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") } 1 2 3 4 一 二 链接 这里是链接 内联元素 请说你好哈哈 请说你好哈 行独占 example: echo 'line' 图片 Hugo has figure shortcode built in, so you can easily add figcaptions or hyperlink rel attributes to images. Documentations can be found here: https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#figure This theme has 3 CSS classes made for figure elements: big: images will break the width limit of main content area.
